item.title: How I got where I am
item.description: I am an extraordinarily lucky individual. My main interest is crafting software that help people, and I happen to live in an economy where that is highly valued. But that doesnâ€™t tell my whole story. How did I get here? I recently graduated with a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science from The University of Akron. While I was at UAkron I learned all about Computer Science as a science, but I was always left wanting for something more.
